name: Whacker Guy: Distance Hunter
summary: Whacker Guy: Distance Hunter is a 3D physics-based baseball batting game set in a beautiful ballpark (Whacker Stadium) with a specific goal - accumulated distance. Total distance is the score. Skill is required to be great and must be learned! Get ready for a challenging and rewarding time, as you improve your timing and hand-eye coordination skills in this baseball lover's dream come true!
